verbs.description: [ARG0: islamic movement] [V: stoned] [ARG1: us] attempted to cart away ammunition and missiles says army the sect who were supposedly in a procession established an illegal roadblock denying motorists free passage when the troops’ convoy attempted to clear the roadblock they met stiff opposition from the sect members of the sect used various objects to barricade the road and also pelted the troops with stones and other dangerous items they smashed both military and civilian vehicles’ windscreens and windows fct james myam troops of army africa commander army nigerian army army islamic movement nigeria official sahara reporters zuba bridge army central ammunition depot 102 guards battalion nigeria ammunition abuja islamic movement
